text:
Hi,

I am seeing the below exception while starting apache 

Invalid command 'AuthzLDAPAuthoritative', perhaps misspelled or defined by a module not included in the server configuration

Loaded the modules

mod_authnz_ldap.so
mod_ldap.so
 

also set 

AuthzLDAPAuthoritative off

Please help in solving the issue
creator: geethachow@gmail.com
ylavic.dev@gmail.com

This buzilla is for reporting bugs only, not for support.

You may want to first have a look at http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/upgrading.html#run-time too .
